name: Rencounter
description: Rencounter is a difficult, turn-based, RPG, roguelike game with a mysterious atmosphere. Help your squad survive while navigating through a network of tunnels and rooms. Distribute provisions and medicine to keep them alive.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 or later Процессор: Core 2 Duo or better Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: ATI or Nvidia graphics card with 512MB video ram or better and Shader Model 3.0+ support. (ATI Radeon 3870 or higher, Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT or higher) DirectX: Версии 9.0c Место на диске: 700 MB

reviews.review_text: Well this is a little gem IF you like VERY difficult games and RNG.  pros: very accurate combat system, good variety of weapons and armor  cons: lacks any tutorial so you gotta figure out (through many deaths) all the mechanics  the general experience is quite frustrating, but again, you must be in the mood for this games (Darkest Dungeon anyone?)
